channel.title: I need a guide on how to make a server
channel.description: i want to make a server using hamachi and just host it off my computer so if my friends want to play they have to have hamachi as well. I done it in minecraft so i kinda get how that part works. I downloaded http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,543393.0.html the client and server and stuck at that point, when i try to run the server i get a black box saying 'The path is not yet specified' i dont know what to do from there can someone give me a list of instructions on what i have to do to setup my server and login into the game, i just want to play it so bad. It doesn't have to be that version of runescape i posted i don't mind which one just as long as it works, thanks :)

item.title: I need a guide on how to make a server
item.dc:creator: @A9X-ZEUS A9X-ZEUS
item.description:
@A9X-ZEUS wrote:

I’m attempting to set up my environmental variables and i dont want to get it wrong currently in the boxes i have:

CLASSPATH: .;C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\lib\ext\QTJava.zip
PATH: C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Windows Live;C:\Program Files (x86)\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Windows Live;C:\Program Files (x86)\NVIDIA Corporation\PhysX\Common;%SystemRoot%\system32;%SystemRoot%;%SystemRoot%\System32\Wbem;%SYSTEMROOT%\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0;C:\Program Files (x86)\QuickTime\QTSystem;C:\Program Files (x86)\Windows Live\Shared

Thats what was in the boxes and im stuck on how to change it im running Win 64 bit and i have 2 program files folders:
Program files
Program files (x86)

there is a java folder in both of them i dont know what to do

Read full topic
item.source: I need a guide on how to make a server

programming, irc, cars

Should be sufficient…

Please try looking next time
